required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Open-label Extension Trial of Cannabidiol (GWP42003-P, CBD) for Seizures in Tuberous Sclerosis Complex (GWPCARE6)
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of Cannabidiol (GWP42003-P, CBD) as Add-on Therapy in Patients With Tuberous Sclerosis Complex Who Experience Inadequately-controlled Seizures

brief_summary.textblock: This trial consists of 2 parts: a double-blinded phase and an open-label extension phase. The open-label extension phase only will be described in this record. All participants will receive the same dose of GWP42003-P. However, investigators may subsequently decrease or increase the participant's dose until the optimal dose is found.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From OLE screening until market authorization is granted for GWP42003-P in TSC (anticipated to be 2 years after the OLE trial start date)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in seizure frequency
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and once market authorization is granted for GWP42003-P in TSC (anticipated to be 2 years after the OLE trial start date)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of treatment responders
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Once market authorization is granted for GWP42003-P in TSC (anticipated to be 2 years after the OLE trial start date)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with worsening, no change, or improvements in seizure frequency
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Once market authorization is granted for GWP42003-P in TSC (anticipated to be 2 years after the OLE trial start date)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in composite focal seizure score

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in number of seizure-free days

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in number of seizures by subtype

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in number of infantile/epileptic spasms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in duration of seizures by subtype

arm_group.description: 100 mg/mL GWP42003-P oral solution taken twice daily (morning and evening). Participants will be dosed up to a maximum of 50 mg/kg/day. Dose may be lower if Investigator judges benefit and/or tolerability issues.

intervention.description: Yellow oily solution containing cannabidiol dissolved in the excipients sesame oil and anhydrous ethanol with added sweetener (sucralose) and strawberry flavoring.

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Completion of the GWEP1521 Blinded Phase
